title: Dragon.Age.Inquisition.All.DLC
description:
Note: The Trespasser DLC will only work on bought retail copies as it is not cracked currently. Yes, you can add all DLC to the game if you own it (play in offline mode).

Install instructions:
- Copy "__Installer" and "Update" folder to your Dragon Age: Inquisition directory 
- Copy "ProfileOptions" file to your save directory
- Overwrite if prompted
- Play

DLC included:
- Deluxe Edition Content
- Red Lyrium Reapers Weapons Pack
- Flames of the Inquisition Armor
- Flames of the Inquisition Weapons Arsenal
- Jaws of Hakkon
- The Black Emporium 
- Spoils of the Avvar
- Spoils of the Qunari
- The Descent
- Trespasser
- Dragonslayer Multiplayer Expansion 
- Destruction Multiplayer Expansion
